bilingual.source: These terraces were built by the local Zhuang and Yao people.
bilingual.target: 这些梯田是当地的壮族和瑶族人建造的。

bilingual.source: Abdullah catches butterflies and sells them to a local craft shop.
bilingual.target: 阿卜杜拉捉蝴蝶并卖给当地的工艺品店。
她在当地的一家面包店工作。
他们参观了当地的监狱。

bilingual.source: He got a job at the local werf.
bilingual.target: 他在当地的造船厂找到了一份工作。

list.abstract: local，英文单词，作形容词、名词，翻译为当地的、局部的、本地人等。

yingyinNormal.en: Here in the U.S., if you can't get there on foot, you can get a ride to your local school, even if it's not that local.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在北国,如果走路不能到的地方你可以搭车去当地的学校，就算不是本地的也行。

yingyinNormal.en: That I invite the local criminals to drop in and strip the house bare?
yingyinNormal.zh: 把当地的罪犯都请进房子来洗劫一空吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I was a powerless and helpless boy, until a local sensei took me under his wing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时是个无依无靠的男孩，直到当地的老师，收留了我。

yingyinNormal.en: Gentlemen, I am now about to send a signal from this laptop through our local ISP.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生们，我现在要通过这台电脑发射一个信号，连接到我们当地的互联网服务供应商。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Mr. President, this is catching us all off guard over here. State, local, we had no idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统先生，这让我们猝不及防。州里的，当地的，我们都不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: It also means they'll have more money to spend at local businesses which grows the economy for everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也意味着他们将有更多的钱在当地的商家进行消费这是在为每一个人发展经济。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what, you find yourself some local tail and you just completely forget what team you're playing for?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么你找了一个当地的马子，就忘了自己的身份了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Then we'd go from there back to East London, we'd go to my dad's local football club where we'd play football for ages, for hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我们会从那回东伦敦，去我爸爸那只当地的足球俱乐部，在那我们会踢很久的球，几个小时。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: When our nation started the interstate highway act, instead of having local commerce, we could get goods coast to coast, top to bottom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我们的国家开始实施了州际高速公路法案来代替当地的商业，我们可以获得商品东海岸到西海岸从上到下。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, the local cuisine was a little more sausage-based than I'm used to, and the result was an internal blitzkrieg, with my lower intestine playing the part of Czechoslovakia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，当地的烹饪方法用的香肠比我习惯的多了一些，结果就是肚子里上演了陆军联合闪电战，我的大肠扮演的是捷克斯洛伐克。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a beautiful but challenging place to live. But the local Li Su people have been living here for more than a thousand years, adapting to living around these giant natural barriers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是当地的傈僳族人，在此生息已逾千年，适应了在天然屏障环绕之中生活。生活在这儿，环境优美却困难重重。

yingyinNormal.en: I started when I was two. Local spots mostly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我两岁开始拍广告。大部分是地方广告。

yingyinNormal.en: We've sent an anonymous tip to the local authorities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经匿名举报给当地部门

yingyinNormal.en: Local young entrepreneur of the year, two years running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本地年度青年企业家得主，连续两年。

yingyinNormal.en: We should get some rest. Find a local inn, or B&B nearby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们该去休息了，找家当地旅馆或是商务酒店。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to work together at every level, federal, state and local.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须在每一个层面上都精诚合作，联邦，州以及当地政府。

yingyinNormal.en: The facility is hidden beneath the local power plant under military guard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个设备被藏在本地发电厂的地底，周围有军队守卫。

yingyinNormal.en: He taught me to think global when I was just local. He made me a wealthy man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我还是个草根时，是他教会我目光远大，是他让我变得富有。

yingyinNormal.en: That's on the Internet? No. No, I contacted the local affiliate in Greenville.
yingyinNormal.zh: 网上有吗？没有，我联系了格林维尔当地电视台。

yingyinNormal.en: The Agency's got a local safe house. You're gonna need it. Don't trash the place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的机构在当地有个安全屋，你会用得着，别搞得太乱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Local</highlight> officials are using the levers that are available to them to safeguard residents' health in the face of a serious threat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对严重威胁，当地官员正在使用他们所能使用的手段来保护居民的健康。

examination_example.sentence: Retail trade groups praised the ruling, saying it levels the playing field for <highlight>local</highlight> and online businesses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售贸易组织对这一裁决表示赞扬，称这为本地和网上企业提供了公平的竞争环境。

examination_example.sentence: Every Saturday morning, at 9 am, more than 50, 000 runners set off to run 5km around their <highlight>local</highlight> park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周六早上9点，5万多名跑步者出发，绕着当地公园跑5公里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
“本地人”用the locals或local people表达。
示例：That's what the locals call the place.
当地人就是这么叫这个地方的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: After a few months of being quite down and unhappy, she was invited to join a <highlight>local</highlight> bike club.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在非常沮丧和不开心的几个月后，她被邀请加入当地的自行车俱乐部。

examination_example.sentence: A representative for the firefighters told the <highlight>local</highlight> TV that removing the chocolate was worse than dealing with snow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消防队员的一名代表告诉当地电视台，清除巧克力比处理积雪更糟糕。

examination_example.sentence: I nearly tripped over someone's computer electrical lead the other day in my <highlight>local</highlight> café.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 前几天在我当地的咖啡馆里，我差点被别人的电脑电线绊倒。

examination_example.sentence: The feeling is just pure. But, he worries, if tourism isn't managed and his fellow <highlight>locals</highlight> continue to move to the mainland, his generation might be the last who can call themselves native Venetians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种感觉是纯粹的。但是，他担心，如果旅游业得不到管理，当地人继续搬迁到大陆，他们这一代可能是最后一代可以自称为威尼斯人的人了。

word_usage.usage:
“本地人”用the locals或local people表达。
示例：That's what the locals call the place.
当地人就是这么叫这个地方的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "It's a really great experience for kids," said a neighbor in an interview with the <highlight>local</highlight> newspaper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “对孩子来说真的是一次非常棒的经历，”一个邻居在当地报纸的采访中说道。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>local</highlight> store
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家本地商店

examination_example.sentence: There are varieties developed to suit specific <highlight>local</highlight> conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开发了新品种，以适应当地的具体情况。

examination_example.sentence: "I was a <highlight>local</highlight> here 20 years ago," I told him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我20年前是这里的本地人，”我告诉他。

examination_example.sentence: I tried skateboarding there, but the <highlight>locals</highlight> were far less welcoming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在那里试过滑板，但当地人远没有那么热情。

examination_example.sentence: This bike tour is the perfect tour for D.C.newcomers and <highlight>locals</highlight> looking to experience Washington, D.C. in a healthy way with minimum effort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个自行车之旅是华盛顿新移民和当地人所希望的以一种最省力的健康方式来体验华盛顿特区的完美旅行。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And what about our <highlight>local</highlight> police who protect our families, our homes and valuable things?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有保护我们家人、家园和贵重物品的当地警察呢?

examination_example.sentence: The news spread widely after it was reported by a <highlight>local</highlight> newspaper ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这条消息被当地报纸报道后广为传播。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese restaurants provide meat with bones to meet <highlight>local</highlight> people's tastes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中餐馆提供带骨的肉以满足当地人的口味。

examination_example.sentence: At that moment, a <highlight>local</highlight> came up to me and asked if I needed any help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那时，一个当地人走过来问我是否需要帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Homestays offer cheap places to stay, and the chance for guests to see the area like a <highlight>local</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 寄宿家庭提供了便宜的住宿场所，让客人有机会像当地人一样游览该地区。

word_usage.usage:
“本地人”用the locals或local people表达。
示例：That's what the locals call the place.
当地人就是这么叫这个地方的。
